short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome extension to collect, categorize, and organize your notes or code snippets.
short.es: Una extensión de Chrome para recopilar, categorizar y organizar tus notas o fragmentos de código.
short.fr: Une extension Chrome pour collecter, classer et organiser vos notes ou extraits de code.
short.hi: अपने नोट्स या कोड स्निपेट्स को संग्रहित, वर्गीकृत और व्यवस्थित करने के लिए क्रोम एक्सटेंशन।
short.zh_CN: 一个 Chrome 扩展，用于收集、分类和组织您的笔记或代码片段。

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Pin Point Note is your go-to tool for capturing, categorizing, and organizing frequently used notes or code snippets. Whether you're a developer, writer, or student, you can quickly save and retrieve snippets of code or important information for faster reuse. With customizable, color-coded tags, you can better organize your notes for easy access.

Key Features:

Add notes and code snippets with customizable, color-coded tags.
Organize your notes by categories, making retrieval quick and easy.
Scrollable note lists for better note management.
Back to Top button for easy navigation within the extension.
Fully responsive and optimized for all screen sizes.
Seamless integration with Chrome storage for saving notes across sessions.
Why Use Pin Point Note?

It’s lightweight, fast, and designed for efficiency.
Perfect for anyone who needs to organize notes, code snippets, or syntax.
Helps you save time by making it easy to access frequently used information.
Built by Ashish Ingle. Contact: ashishingle589@gmail.com

Keywords:
Note-taking
Code snippets
Syntax storage
Productivity tool
Chrome extension
Organize notes
Quick notes
Developer tools
Bookmark manager
Syntax snippets
